channel.title: Change username command for all players
channel.description: i need a change username command so people can change there name while in game with a command. I got one that makes a new account with all thier stuff but doesnt delete their old account

item.title: Change username command for all players
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

Well for this you would have to basically alter the givemod command. If you search around you can find a few good ones.

Basically what you want to do is just take all the lines but the one that changes the players rights and add them into the command. Make SURE you add in exception catches.
Which means certain names that they can not use. something like
if (c.playerName != “Admin” || c.playerName != “sarranoob”) {
c.playerName = playerCommand.substring(15);
c.sendMessage(asdgadsg;asgkdsjgash);
}
else {
c.sendMessage(“YOU CAN’T USE ADMINS USER NAMES BRO”);
}

Or something like that

But the file save method can be found in any good givemod command.

Read full topic
item.source: Change username command for all players

item.title: Change username command for all players
item.dc:creator: @sarranoob sarranoob
item.description:
@sarranoob wrote:

I need a little help, this is the idea:
[b] - after code is entered the player have to be kicked bthy5?

  • the character file gets copied with the new name as title bthy5
  • in the new character file the username must be the new one bthy5? is this one set allery?
  • the old char file have to be deleted (i am working on this one)[/b]

like lolboy396 said, it will be handy if we got you code you got so far
